content.detailedDescription: Flying in from australia to los angeles. i caught a view of this object from the left hand  side of the plane.Thank god i had camera in hand,i turned trying to centre the object in my lens unfortunately the object was moving way to fast and this all the camera caught. i know it was not a bird.Not at that elevation. photo was taken with a kodak digital c310.
content.summary: Flying in from australia to los angeles i saw this object on the star board side window of the plane

content.detailedDescription:
i had a fitfull sleep last night.  i was worried about a union meeting i was to be the focal point of the next day.  i woke at about 2:30 am.  i have an alarm clock by my bed.  i have no blinds or curtains on my bedroom window.  i am on the 11th floor and have a great view of downtown saint paul. as i turned away from the alarm clock i noticed a bright light which struck me as unsual.  it took a second to figure out what it was.  there were no blinking lights like you notice with planes or helicopters.  i sat up and opened the window.  it was about 3o degrees or so last night.  i was wide awake with cold air blowing in my face.
     what i saw was a round disc in the night sky.  it came from the south moving north towards the state capitol.  there were no blinking lights, but it was lit underneath with pastel pink and maby yellow.  the dominate color was a light red or pink.  it sailed over my building and i lost sight of it.  all i want to know is did anyone else see this thing this morning around 2:00 - 3:00 this morning?
content.summary: Around 2:00am i saw a disc shaped object silently fly over my apt.

content.detailedDescription: we were at my sister's house- in her back yard which faces north and is located on a golf course in doral- close to mia. sheri and i were helping my brother in law move his new hammock to the middle of the backyard on the grass. the hammock was positioned north to south. sheri wanted to try the hammock and proceeded to lay on it- feet pointing north. she gazed up- to notice how fast the sparse clouds were moving. then, a little to the north, she noticed a group of small lights at a very high altitude- traveling from north to south. she pointed up to show me and i saw them immediately. i saw the objects and, at first, told her that it was all a trick of the eye and that those were stars that appeared to be moving because of the fast pace in which the clouds were passing overhead. it seemed too obvious to me that the objects were moving against the cloud direction. well, i kept on looking and sure enough, 2 of the objects started to move even faster towards the south pulling away from the others. the 2 objects were then directly over us side by side east/west. then in an instant, the object on the right/east ��� shot off 90 degrees to the east leaving a streak of light that lasted a second. the other object then sped up to the south and disappeared. i called you afterwards. i also remember during the sighting- i had said out loud that the lights reminded me of the mexico lights.
content.summary: Two white objects, one shoots off at 90 degrees

content.detailedDescription:
I don't really know why i feel compelled to give this account of what my family went through so long ago; but here goes....
when i was approx. 11 years old, ( i'm now 40) we were having a large family reunion at my grandparent's house "out in the country" of rural southeast missouri. there was approx. 45-50 of us outside in the heat of the summer, churning an old-time ice-cream churn. it was just starting to get a little dark out, when the kids ( including myself) noticed a very bright object in the western sky, up over the next hilltop from our location. we thought it was just the "evening star", and being kids, were oohhing and aahhing how pretty the "star" was. but the "star", although remaining stationary, kept getting brighter and brighter, until all of us knew it could not be a star. after getting intensely bright and bigger, it dimmed down again, to it's original form. then the light went out completely, and changed into a repeating light pattern. it had individual lights around it, that were going on and off in a circular/oval pattern. the object definitely had form, structure, and mass. all of us could plainly see it, and tell that it was "saucer" shaped. it slowly began, to move to our right, and then 6 more disc's "appeared" and joined up with the first object. all of the objects were "disc' or "saucer" shaped, and had rotating circular/oval lights, and were hovering around by each other, in no particular pattern. i can only estimate that the objects were probably a half mile away from us. the objects began to kind of fly together, moving to the right. just one disc would always be flying different than the rest of them, almost like "herding" the other's. i can remember all of us being absolutely petrified. the children were screaming running into the house ( me included ). the adults were scared, and some were running for cover, as well. i believe all of us thought that, for a lack of a better word, we were going to be invaded, bombed, or something. the disc's stayed outside, hovering close, for about 1 hour and finally left. we don't speak of this, and i still have nightmares.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple hovering objects in 1978-eyewitness account

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night and i couldn't sleep and i decided to look out the window to see if i could see any ufos.  i'm not the wierdo with a tinfoil hat seeing ufos in every cloud, but i know what i saw.  i saw a sphere of light, bright gold, and i have a picture to prove it.  the creature didn't show up on the picture, but the creature was tall, skinny, and pink.  when i turned away to see what time it was after i took the picture, the ufo rocketed up into the sky.  and that's pretty much it.
content.summary: Sphere of light with creature stepping out

content.detailedDescription:
I have been sitting on this story for 30 years and feel the obligation to report it. a friend and i were moving belongings into an apartment near aschaffenburg, germany in february 1977.

we dropped off a car load at the apartment and started to return to aschaffenburg(after this town)in my car. the time was about 1130-1200 at night. as we left the village my apartment was in, we saw an oval shaped light pattern, football shaped, with 1 red light at each end, 3 red lights at the top, equally spaced and 2 red lights with 1 green light between them, also equally spaced at the bottom. none of the lights were blinking. we were in a very narrow valley, about 500 meters wide and the object was at our same vertical height above the ground. i estimate no more than 300 meters away. i also estimate, due to the apparent distance to the object, taht it was about 35 feet in length and 15 feet from top to bottom as indicated by the lights. i was driving and did not stop. we only commented to each other that neither of us had ever seen that particular light pattern on an aircraft before.

we continued our trip to town and began our return with another car load of belongings. our route took us up and along the side of an open hill with a superb view to the north and west i believe. we were overlooking the town on a bright, clear night and at this time it was about 1am. i am an observer wheh i drive and am continually looking around at the vicinity aroung my car at all times. as we neared the top of the hill we were driving up, i looked to my left and saw a very large, bright, round light in the sky. i am a professional soldier and know that we humans have no depth perception during darkness so i won't speculate on the distance to this light. i will say without a doubt that i knew that it was out of place. i pointed it out to my friend , he saw it, and when we got to the top of the hill, i stopped the car and turned off the motor. we both got out of the car and this is what we saw.

there was a very large, round bright light hanging motionless in the sky that was completely out of perspective with every other light that we could see. because we were on a hill top, the light was not apparently too much higher than we were. i will estimate it's height above the ground below it to be less than 3000 feet. this will become clear in a moment. we stood outside the car and it was a brilliant clear cold winter night with zero cloud cover.

as we watched this large light, another light appeared dropping from what was apparently the bottom of the large light. (imagine looking at a spot light and having a 100 watt light bulb fall out of it) the small light fell apparently 100-200 feet below the large light and stopped in the air. it held that position for about 2 seconds and winked out. about 2 seconds after the small light winked out, the same oval or football shaped red and green light patern that we had seen on the way to town appeared in it's place and this object travelled toward us and to our right, apparently following the path of the original object we had seen down the same narrow valley. this valley was to our right front, and as the object approached and passed us it was within no more than 1000 meters and as it passed, below us so that we were looking down on it. at no time did either of us hear anything at all.

this act was repeated at 4-5-6 minute intervals 5 more times, for a total of 6. (7 including the original spotting about an hour before) we didn't have a watch and no other clock so the times are approximate. assuming a 5 minute interval, we witnessed this activity for about 30 minutes.

the only speculation i am willing to make about this sighting is that it was not anything i have ever seen before or since. it appeared to be a large aircraft of some kind, air-launching several smaller aircraft. i don't know of any power on the planet with that capability.

after the 6th  object, no others appeared for about 10 minutes. we were cold so we left the hill top and continued to my apartment. during the entire 30-40 minutes we were on the hill top, the large, bright white light remained stationary in the sky as far as we could tell and was still in the same position when we left.

if i were given a relatively accurate map of the area, preferrably a military 1:50,000 with grid lines, i could pinpoint where these sightings took place within 50 meters or so.

i know that what i saw was extraordinary. we had no camera so there are no pictures.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At least 6 aircraft, air-launched 5-6 minutes apart from a larger aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
jusr had to get to the vet . on way to car noticed a big cloud in
sky had a big round hole in it. couldn't wait,grabed cammera and
made it to the car.Cloud did not dissenpate. it was just starting
to faid when all came out ot the vets with cat(mouth infection)
   got several pictures  and it was visable for about the whole trip, about 10 miles..Took several more photos after we came out
   still in camera, have not figured out how to hook up my camera to 
the printer   or down load to cd   more stuff,  did not see the ufo
   other stuff at other times wife neg abdjection / abduction?????
310 830 8583     et activity in bedroom
                                           ae / sharon/west
 thinking that hypnosis would bring out more data about some bodie marks and blood puddle (5in., across) on top of the bed_head board and spatters around the room...
content.summary: Hole in cloud    (disk)   round

content.detailedDescription: Today one object fell from the sky at 12:30 am jan3 2007
content.summary: Fell from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
The light was first seen as i was driving on route 74 from the center of tolland toward willington, ct just as i finished the sharp bend at the old cathole road intersection. i was driving home after visiting a friend and was alone.
home was about one quarter of a mile away. i slowed considerably and kept the light in my peripheral vision as i turned into the home street (gary road) and then up the driveway, then another turn to park which positioned my view directly where the ufo was located. once parked i turned off my lights and the light in the sky, which had remained stationary, made a slow move toward my position. it was at that moment that i realized i was seeing a ufo. i watched in amazement for what seemed to be a short time  then turned to see if anybody else was home. to my dismay, it appeared that i was the only one at the house, but my younger sister may be inside. the ufo would float closer and move back but never to the same location, changing it's position each time i made a move of some sort such as taking the keys out of the ignition. i decided to make a run into the house to see if anybody was inside. as soon as i opened the car door, the ufo made an incredibly fast relocation quite a distance away. i ran toward the house and up the first section of stairs, which required turning my back to the ufo. once at the first plateau of the steps, i turned to look at it again and it shot away and almost instantly was out of sight. once i got into the house, i was disappointed to find nobody there. i did look at the clock and saw that the time was 9:30. i distinctively remember the clock radio in my car reading 8:00 when i turned the car off in the driveway. what seemed to be only a few minutes of watch the ufo had actually consumed 90 minutes. the realization was startling and a bit frightening.
i waited until the next day to get the newspaper to see if there were any reports of ufo sightings and found none. i never filed a report with any authorities. understanding that i was one of the privileged few to have this experience was enough satisfaction to me.
i have told many people about my sighting. some time in the late 1990s i watched a television show on public television's nova on ufos and was very excited to hear the description of a very similar experience that a priest in mexico had. the uniquely colored very bright light moving in smooth but radical ways and eventually flying away in a split second.
i have checked "circle" and "sphere" as a shape description, but all i could really see was the intense light that appeared round in shape. the most recent report of ufo sightings in chicago inspired me to file my report at this time. i am sure there are many more citizens like me that have seen ufos and have never reported them wishing to avoid attention and the criticism that always comes from authorities and the non-believing public.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A uniquily colored light in the night sky moving radically

content.detailedDescription: On 12/30/06 we were returning from cincinnati at approximately 10:30pm. upon pulling into our driveway on s. state 101, i was exiting the passenger side of the vehicle when i noticed a remarkably fast moving object to the north. it was a steady burning amber light. it shot across the sky and came to a screeching halt, then started to do a 180degree turn. the sky was slightly hazy. it was not an airplane that i could ascertain as it was not blinking. it was steady burning and moving at extraordinary velocity. uncertain what the altitude was. it appeared to be northwest of richmond. after it did the 180, it shot up and disappeared.
content.summary: Amber light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with a friend when she said too me look over there.  i looked and there they were 3 metel balls in the sky. the first one just speeded away before i could get a good fix on it , it was gone but the other too just floted up too what looked like a lage black spot in the sky.
content.summary: A pin ball as big as a house or large trailer

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my grandmothers house in solon, ohio. solon is located 25 miles south-east of cleveland, ohio. the time was around 8 o'clock in the evening. and the sun was setting and i was sitting on the front porch. so i decided to look up at the sun set. and the house faces north. so i looked up at what i thought was an airplane. so i kept on looking at it and it was going unusualy slow. the craft was flying between 20,000 and 25,000 ft. it was a siverish color and i saw it for about 2-3 minutes. when i saw it i quickly went inside to tell my grandmother and i pointed to where it was and it was still in the same area. it was moving to the east. i have seen and i know many different types of aircraft from airliners like the 747  to the airbus 308 and jets like the sr-71 and the f-117 and the b-2 and black aircraft like the aurora and the x-32. and after about 2 minutes it was gone it just disappered. i felt really weird because i have never seen any thing like it.
content.summary: A silverish cigar shape heading east

content.detailedDescription:
Today,  i came out of trader joe's market in torrance california rolling hills shopping center, i was loading my car with groceries. i looked up at the sky because i have had three previous sightings since about 1941-2,  i did not mention it to any one but my family. which was hard enough to have them believe the facts. 
today i saw the sphere that kept rising until it started to disappear beyond a vapory cloud, it looked like it might have been above the lax airport area. i mentioned it to two passer by's, and they said what i said as well, that it looks like a ufo.  i had a camera that i keep on me most of the time just in case i'd have this kind of incident, but i could not get it out of my pocket in time to photograph it before it was out of sight.

if you contact me i can tell you about the other three sightings that i had, there is too much information involved to write about all the details on this page. but i must say, the incidents are still crystal clear in my mind after all these years, my past events are something that i will never forget. 
yours truly.
joseph valenti
content.summary: A rising sphere

content.detailedDescription:
See the photo.
1. touristic trip.
2. i noticed the object after being returned home (kyiv, ukraine).
3. it resembles a jetfighter.
4. the object was silent.
5. no reactions and feelings.
6. i did not see it during making the snapshot.
content.summary: Sky object

content.detailedDescription: Esto sucedi��� en diciembre del 2006 tambi���n, cuando me dirig���a al trabajo de mi hija  a recogerla, apareci��� en el cielo un ufo, y tome video, volaba despacio como estudiando el ���rea d���ndome suficiente tiempo para tomarle video y en un segundo desaparecio en la noche. mando unas secuencias del video que tome.
content.summary: Ufo observando el area

content.detailedDescription:
December saturday  at 1:36 p.M.  2006
when the airplanes that left their famous smoke, in  the sky i watch a luminous object and takes photos.
content.summary: Luminous object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog around park (the sky is always busy with air traffic lax and torrance airports)but i see approaching from the south at an estimated height of 6-8000 ft a glowing yellow/orange ball of light. the color of the light was different to those forward facing aeroplane headlights (not as bright. after about five minutes of walking, i stopped, to see if the object was moving. it was, but very slowly. for a moment from side to side, but it continued on its path northward nnw. it also seemed to gain some altitude before eventually disappearing in the light haze of an almost full moon night. its journey that i viewed, took approx. 20 mins.To pass over my view of the night sky. even a high altitude aircraft would have passed this area in about 5 mins. my pleasure of viewing, as i have already said, was about 20 mins.
content.summary: Glowing yellow -orange coloured ball/star like

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday at 1:29 i saw an unidentified object in the sky by my house, and immediately i took a photograph of it, i watched how it relesed gas  and  carried something, at the beggining nothing was watched and later i noticed that it carried something, or something persecuted it, it flew up in the sky and disappeared
content.summary: White object

content.detailedDescription:
On any clear day point a video camera with a long lens (100x plus) directly at the sun. be sure to block the disk of the sun with an object such as a streetlight, they work well. focus to infinity and stop down to your highest f-stop and shoot at 1/1000 sec or faster. using a canon gl2 i stopped to f-8 and shot at 1/8000 and 1/15000 sec shutter speed and 30 frames per second "frame mode". the result was seeing dozens if not hundreds of craft circling in a pattern in our line of sight to the sun. they are cooperating given the speed they must be traveling it's impressive there are no collisions.

i've gone out four times and each time i am able to repeat the results of the first shoot. people have said it looks like dust floating around a streetlight. dust never moves that fast and when zoomed in it doesn't look like any dust i've seen. see what you think.

i'm sending full zoom stills from the videos.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=v0hzkf7oog0 is low res video.

at the end of this clip look for a sphereical metalic object drifting in toward the sun from the top of the frame. the object blocking the sun is a streetlight. if you pause the video often you can see individual craft frozen in the pattern. you can also see craft leaving the pattern and some just glide past on their own way. near the end of the clip during the zoom in, notice the speed of circulation and realize these craft are 25 to 75 miles away from the camera. the pattern must be hundreds of miles around the circle and the craft make a complete circuit several times every second.

1. where: mt ashland ski resort parking lot what: shooting alien video
2. i discovered this from still images shot earlier that summer.
3. the objects are alien craft, what else could they be?
4. description: look at the pictures there are different types.
5. validation is how it feels.
6. i lost sight when i turned off the camera. they are there any time we want to look, but we need the camera's fast "eye" to see them. it works like a strobe light works to time the ignition of a car. the strobe allows us to see the timing mark on the harmonic balancer rather than a blur.
content.summary: Multiple different craft in rapid circling pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My mom (who was visiting me from ohio)and i were watching television when i noticed something outside of my window.  i motioned for my mom to come over only to see a triangluar object hovering for a quick second then picking up speed and then slowly hovering again. it started out to the left of the back of my property, made it's way over my barn and then did a quick left.  we lost site in the one window, only to go over to the other one to find that it had made it's way to the other side of the property heading towards rome road.   during the 3hr time span, 6 more appeared just slowly making their way.  one of the other six we know was a circular while the remaining 5 we are not so sure.  the one thing we do know is the first one we saw near my barn and going towards rome road was in the shape of a triangle.  we really at first thought of it as plane activity since we are in a flight path but these were flying way too low to be a plane.  the entire time we were stunned and amazed by what we saw as it had been years since the last sighting in our area.  we lost site of them all one after the other as each picked up speed and disappeared. we attempted to get footage by way of my camera phone but was unable to capture them.


please note though that when i say hillsdale county and city being addison, my farm is located outside of addison just a few miles from where the lenawee county and hillsdale county borders meet on north adams road with the nearest crossroad to us being somerset road.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 different ufo's within hours of each other

content.detailedDescription:
My name is brian clark. i am 17 years old now. when i viewed the object i was about 7 or 8.  this experience was a very large one, even though it was very short lived. one day in the summer i was outside. this was in the backyard of my house on the porch facing north. the sky was very vivid and i could see the stars brightly. i was old enough at the time to know the differance from a commercial jet or airline and something else. my mom or dad went inside for a moment and i looked up and saw this brilliant object in the sky. it looked pretty clear and far away, so it must have been pretty large. it moved in a mechanical path from ne to sw at a slow pace, but judging by the distance it was from me it must have been moving very quickly. at the time i felt a little disappointed that it was moving so slow, but i was still amazed by its presence. i looked for about 5 or 8 seconds as it flew past me. it was like a fat disk shape with 10 or more lights on its side. the lights were constant and did not blink. it had an object on its top that i couldnt make out its shape exactly. i think i ran in to get the binoculars and it had vanished. i then told my dad and he didnt believe me. the next day i told my mom and she told me it might be from the millitary. she believed it was possibly a secret project and flight. i think it was a large pleidian 

im almost completely sure that this was real, but i always try to keep an open mind that maybe it was just a dream, or a mirage or a hullucination. i had always loved the stars as a child and this experience made me look at them with wonder even more.
content.summary: Fat disk with 10 or 12 lights on side.

content.detailedDescription: The object i saw last night flying over my home in tallahassee, fl was large and to me seemed cylindrically shaped.  i was sitting outside on my patio so i am estimating about the time of evening it came into view was about 9-ish eastern time.  it was flying rather high and slowly in a direction from north or north west to the south.  and after several minutes of watching, looked as if it may have curved to a more south eastern path.  i noticed it approaching because of the size, slow speed and light .. unlike the airplanes or satellites i've seen .. and because it was extremely bright, steadily emitting whitish light.  eventually i lost view of the object because of trees.  i was excited because it was a very unusual thing and then i thought perhaps i was looking at the shuttle going back to the space center.  that's until today when i looked it up and found out that it already landed december 22.  i am very curious and reporting this episode hoping that someone else in the south georgia/north florida area got a better look at the actual object/craft than i did.  or, perhaps somebody knows exactly what i was watching.
content.summary: First thought it was the space shuttle flying over, it seemed larger and brighter then tonight i discovered the shuttle landed on dec. 22.

content.detailedDescription: I am not certain of the date and year? it had to be between 1980 - 1982? i was attending college at the time. i was also playing guitar for a church prayer meeting in norwich ct. after the meetings i would usually join a group of friends to go to "friendly's" for an ice cream. i know it was late because i remember the friendly's closing for the night. it is a 20 minute ride up rt. 2 to colchester ct. so it was around 1am. i was unfortunately alone. just as i was taking the parem road exit into colchester i noticed a strange object over the tree line of the opposite side of the highway. i stopped my car at the end of the exit and sat on the hood of my car as i had a great view of the object. this lasted for at least 5 minutes. it was stationary & totally silent. i have never read or seen anybody else describe on the net or on tv anything like what i witnessed. the object was oval in shape. solid bright white in the center. as one viewed outward from the center the object became transparent with a distinct edge that moved. i can only best describe the edge as being like a jelly fish! it had an organic appearance. the overall size would be at best  guess at 20 to 25 feet? no flashing or colored lights. in the center where it was bright and solid there was a perfect vertical narrow black rectangle. very un-organic looking! this rectangle was vibrating and moving left to right always staying within the solid area of white. i kept hoping that another car would come up the exit but colchester was a pretty dead town after 9pm back in the 80s. after about 5 minutes the object began to move directly north.  it slowly moved over what once was the chestnut lodge restaurant. i got in my car and tried to follow it but it headed north towards hartford. this is over a small valley so following mainstreet colchester i quickly lost sight of it. early the next morning i called a friend of mine about the incident. he later called me and told me that there was a rash of reports of ufo sightings to the hartford police dept that night on the television news.  i wish i took note of what station he was watching, what day it was, checked the newspapers for any writeups ... i didnt realize at that time that 26 years later i would still be dying to know what it was i saw and wanting to hear someone elses account of it. for the record i dont subscribe to ufo magazines, or own any books, or have any desire to visit area 51... it is not a hobby for me. i have shared what i have seen honestly to alot of people. i would hope that my general lack of interest would give a little more credibility to my sighting? but i do keep an open mind.( i have no choice now!) i would love to know if anyone else saw what i saw back in the early eighties? or even modern reports that are the similar?
content.summary: Partialy transparent oval shaped object solid black vertical line in center

content.detailedDescription: Dropped my wife off at bowling alley far north end of town drove toward end of lot by farm field and looked as always into the sky out there because of no obstructions and its darkness and noticed a yellowish object under the clouds we had high overcast with stars earlier didn't think much of it went home took my dog out and the object was still out there after taking dog in sat down for an hour then left to pickup my wife looked in sky and still in same spot went back in to get my binoculars to get a better look seem to distant but all through this its color stayed a white/yellow color not moving as a star or planet drove to bowling alley and watched as object started to pulse(blinking)then it moved all of a sudden due north for approx. 5 seconds then a 90 degree turn to due east and sped at a super fast speed across the sky until it disappeared from sight in just a few seconds this event started when seen at about6pm and lasted to 8:25pm
content.summary: Aeriel amazement 4th time in my life

content.detailedDescription: I was attending school in plainwell, and i was shown by my roommate who knew more about it. i was told they are already here. without hestitation with his stories, i wanted more evidence. so i was driven out to a dirt road and i saw it. it was dark, i mean real dark. no light, just the objects that twinkled. i have been changed for the rest of my life because of that story. the next day i was in a state of shock. the government has knowledge like you will never believe. the military knows more about it than you think. never lost sight of the object, just now know they! are hear. call me crazy, call me stupid. i know what i saw. just don't laugh at me.
content.summary: These particular objects hovered and changed colors.....At night

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture with a kodak digital c310. i was taking pictures of the california shoreline .Thank god i was already holding my camera because i saw an object flying at an incredible speed.I snapped the picture trying to centre the picture in my lens but this is all i got.You can see the cigar/cylindar shaped object in the top left hand corner of the picture.
content.summary: Took a picture from an airplane and picked up a cigar

content.detailedDescription: well a few maonths ago i started researching ufo's and extraterrestrials i really don't know why but it felt like i had to research them . so when i found out alot of precise good info i started to spread the word about them . which stop my friends from talking to me and everyone not believing me.Finally i was at a good friends house the only one i had, and we had seen two orbs off in the distance appear and then disappear, from then on i increased my study on them , a couple of days ago i was at his house again . we were looking out his new telescope i bought him for christmas when his stepdad a non-believer said why don't u look at the bright star over there . i said that star appeared there seconds ago then all the sudden u hear him say holy sh*t did u see that thing shoot up in the sky and disappear i looked at the star and notice it wasn't there . me and my friend said now do u believe us , he said well i know that wasn't an airplane. a few days later my sisters' boyfriend was outside with my stepdad , i heard them yelling for everyone to come hear fast, i finally ran out and seen 4-5 orbs zooming over our house in the sky . well there was a ufo reporting on fox 13 news saying a ufo was in chicago. i called up my sister in law ,summer and had my family tell her the truth there was ufo's over my house i told everyone thats why i research them because they are real.After everyone went inside i was still talking to her outside looking at them. they changed from white to purple.She told me this may be a sign to me . i told her everything about my other sightings and how i don't know why i'm researching them. it's weird i start researching them and they show up over my house . i really don't know why this happened but i hope u could tell me. i know i wrote stuff that doesn't concern the ufo's but i need an answer i have weird feelings now and i don't know if i should keep going on with my research . but i do know 2007 will bring great things for me and the ufo and extraterrestrial researchers .Thankyou i hope i will get an answer.I'm 18 by the way and my family agreed to let me tell you about this . good luck on finding the truth and spreading the news or do u already know the truth but have trouble on spreading it.
content.summary: 4-5 white orbs that change to purple zooming over our house .

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just finished visiting our daughter for christmas dinner.We were driving home on the barnet highway when i saw something out of the corner of my eye on the passager side while i was driving.I said to my wife look at that, she was amazed as it was a large triangular shaped craft.There was no traffic behind or in front of us at the time.It was the size of a football field about 500 feet high.We did not hear any sound it had white lights and green lights at the three corners of the triangle,and a red beacon light dead center bottom of the craft.Then all of a sudden a white ball of light the size of a baseball came from the east and shot up the center of the red beacon type light.It was like a ball of energy or plazma.We were still moveing slowly at this time on the highway when the tree line started and lost sight of the craft.We did not stop for fear of a car hitting us from behind it all happed so fast.Till this day i wished i would have stopped but i will never know what would have happened.I reported it to ufo b.C. our local ufo site.It is in the report under december 25th 2001,check the web site.I also investigated myself and found that close to that laocation is the port moody hydro electric station the largest in north america.This can also be checked out on the internet.I am sending this now because of looking at mufons oct.10, 2006 report knik alaska.I believe the white ball that re entered the craft was a probe of some type that was suppling energy it tranported from the port moody hydro electric plant.Please reply with some kind of response as it still is in my mind.
content.summary: No time left

content.detailedDescription: Witness reported that he was driving north on us hwy 421 this morning and had stopped at a traffic light in mountain city, tn. as he sat at the traffic light and was watching for it to change, he noted a large shiny (silvery-white)  slightly elongated disc shaped object moving in the sky beyond the lights in a slow wobbly motion to the west and below broken clouds.  at first he stated, he thought it was some kind of blimp or something possibly  dangling from the wires but soon realized what he was observing was very high in the sky. he estimated the object to be the size of a silver dollar at arm's length and about 45 degrees in elevation from his position. the object was smooth, featureless and was plainly visible in the early morning light. he stated that as he watched, a gentleman in a car beside him rolled down his window and yelled "what the (expletive) is that?".The reporting witness rolled down his window and replied. when they looked back at the position the object was in previously, it was gone from sight. we request that anyone else having witness this event, please report your experience here using this form. ks(mufon east tn.)
content.summary: Disc shaped object observed  by multiple witnesses while waiting on a traffic light

content.detailedDescription:
On or about the middle of september of 1982, i witnessed what i beleive to be a ufo.  this event was also witnessed by another person standing next to me.  the incident occurred in the republic of korea, just outside of the capital.  i was in the us army, and was in the field doing field training exercises for an upcoming larger event.  we had all of our attack helicopters with us positioned tactically in the field, and were conducting 24/7 simulated combat operations.  at about 6:00am, i walked towards the dining tent where there was fresh coffee and soup for the guards that had been on gaurd duty during the night.  i walked out of the tent and stopped dead in my tracks.  the tent was facing down a valley, and the valley was covered in fog.  out of that fog, came a machine that was slowly moving up the valley at about 100-150ft agl(above ground level) traveling at about 10-15 kias (knots indicated airspeed).  i immediately began looking for any type of national markings., ie usa, rok, north korean, soviet, etc.  i saw no markings of any type at all on the craft.  it was shaped like a childs toy top.  at the top of the craft were spinning/flashing multi-colored lights and it made absolutely no sound at all.  the craft was a shiny mettalic and i was not able to distinguish any kind of aircraft lines (rivets, fairings, etc.)  it appeared to be smooth.  the object came within about 500 meters from my location.  i listend very closely for any type of indicator of engine noise and did not hear a gas turbine engine, nor any other noise assosciated with an internal combustion engine.  whatever propulsion system it had did stir the surrounding fog however it wasnt a huge wind/air disturbance like a helicopter or jet engine would make.  it did not make any type of radical flight movements and did not try to evade.  it slowly hovered up the valley directly over the tops of the attack helicopters, but did not slow down nor did i see any kind of surveillance cameras.  as it travled up the valley the lights continued to rotate at the top but was still very silent, then disappeared into the fog.  the surrounding area did not have any type of conventional aircraft flying as the weather would not permit flight.  the other witness to this was a very senior us army noncommissioned officer.  when i looked over at him and asked him if he just saw what i saw, he stared me down very hard, and told me that "i didnt see a thing", then turned around and walked away.  

i am a recently retired us army aviation first sergeant/master sergeant, and at that time of the ufo sighting i was totally and completely sober, had plenty of sleep, did not have any type of vision or hearing problems and was well trained in the identification of military aircraft worldwide.  this was not a military aircraft that can be found in jane's or in any type of publication other than extraterrestial books.  i firmly believe that this was a ufo, that it was possibly curious about the helicopters and the extensive military manuevers that were going on previously to this day and took the opportunity to get a closer observation because of the weather problems on that day.  again, there was a very dense fog that did not permit any type of flight by a conventional aircraft, and it was not a drone, nor was it a satellite.  

thank you for your time and attention.  i do not have photos but could very easily draw a picture as i remember it like it was yesterday.

very respectfully,


bradley j. chaffee
first sergeant, us army (ret)
content.summary: Aircraft shaped like a child toy top spinning
